title: 🚀 ONE PIECE Sets Sail for Season 2 in 2026
description: New episodes arrive in 2026, with the Straw Hats heading into the Grand Line! Expect Loguetown, Drum Island, and a major appearance by Chopper. Production wrapped and a special behind-the-scenes has been shared.
